ingredients.ingredient: 5 ½ pounds apples - peeled, cored and finely chopped

cookingTips: Cook on low for 8-10 hours, stirring occasionally to prevent sticking and ensure even cooking
Blend or mash the finished product to your desired consistency
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Apple butter is a long-cooking preserve. Are you using a slow cooker and familiar with the final consistency you want?
